mapper.insert: INSERT INTO members (userid, password, username, birthday, email, profile_img, reg_date, edit_date) VALUES (#{userid}, #{password}, #{username}, #{birthday}, #{email}, #{profile_img}, #{reg_date}, #{edit_date});
mapper.select: SELECT userid, username, birthday, email, profile_img, reg_date, edit_date FROM members WHERE member_no=#{member_no};
mapper.update: UPDATE members SET profile_img= #{profile_img} WHERE member_no = #{member_no}
